name: Olea's Descent
description:
Deep below the ruins of a overgrown temple lies the last loose thread connecting the lands with the goddess of death.

Climb down and survive until you find humanity's last hope.Build your own hero
With every new character you get the chance to create your dream character.
Lots of different playstyles. Use magic or miracles to boost yourself or harm your enemies or just simply
smash their head in with your trusty axe.
Or do you prefer the tactical approach? Lay traps for your enemies!


Features

- Strategic round based combat
- Build your own Hero with many Skills and Attributes
- Each time a new way to play with 15 different weapons and armors
- procedural generated levels
- Steam achievementsEver changing Shrine
The shrine changes with each new character.
